Text: Mario Forever, remake of Mario Bros created by a Polish fan group, with own improved graphs and melodías. Of between the games done by fans based on Mario, probably he is the best one, not having anything to envy to the original games. With very good graphs and music, great jugabilidad and hidden levels and secrets, like all Mario that boasts.
